definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="225" y="99"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="world_data_logic_getgamerule"><field name="gamerulesboolean">DO_MOB_LOOT</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">loot spawn ~ ~ ~ loot fnaf_mod:entities/toy_foxy</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></statement><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">summon fnaf_mod:mangle_sitting</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
